column4: @monopool_ @spidal4ever @angelheart2015 I agree 100% with all of you. At the end of the day, NRS is a racist/colorist company (at least in my eyes) so i don’t expect much from them anymore. I just hate it when people be like, “Well then stop playing it if you don’t like it.” Like bitch i payed OVER 100$ for this game🤬

@monopool_ @spidal4ever @angelheart2015 Like, i’m not the only person who payed so much for this game so when people say stupid shit like that its really annoying. Try saying something like that within other communities like Street Fighter or Streets of Rage communities. I guarantee they won’t say it again.🌚☕️

@spidal4ever @angelheart2015 @KahnumEmpress Back then I was like "Yeah they wouldn't put stryker in mk11, there's no way they'd handle him with any tact" and boy did nrs prove me fuckin right when aftermath came out

@spidal4ever @angelheart2015 Robocop was released during all of the protesting, police brutality, etc. He has a brutality we’re he still shoots the opponent even when they have their hands up literally begging for him NOT to shoot them. Now image where they got THAT idea from. People say it was from the-
@spidal4ever @angelheart2015 *imagine
@spidal4ever @angelheart2015 Where

@angelheart2015 There was also a scrapped intro where sindel refers to johnny as her "love slave" or smth along those lines. Those Sonya/Nightwolf and Jade/Jacqui intros in particular are making me physically cringe, why did they even put that to paper.
@monopool_ Because...edgy white men [derogatory]

@spidal4ever @angelheart2015 -movie but I’ve seent the movie a thousand times with my father and NEVER once did he shoot and kill the guy. Then it’s implied that Jade calls Jacqui the N word. Not saying that all blacks go around callin each other that but like if they’re BOTH supposed to be black then-

@spidal4ever @angelheart2015 -why would Jacqui get offended?🤨 Just saying I’m not surprised at this point. I said it once before that MK11 comes off as the most racist MK game in history. I could go on but I think you get my point 🌚☕️
@KahnumEmpress @angelheart2015 Was there a Robocop line that was fcked up? Or his presence in general?

@monopool_ @angelheart2015 @KahnumEmpress No one was requesting him before release. Only some old head fans getting happy when they saw him. I’ve seen ppl ask for Stryker more than him and having Stryker would be just as bad

@angelheart2015 @spidal4ever @KahnumEmpress Nobody even wanted Robocop nor do I think anyone was excited for him (i guess aside from the fans of the movies?) so this was just a huge lose lose for nrs. I still resent and hate all the bs from mk twitter last year because of that dumb character's release.

@spidal4ever @monopool_ @KahnumEmpress It was definitely bad timing and coincidence that Robocop dropped during the height of the protests. His outros and brutalities don't help at all and opened a can of worms with more edgy racism from racist fanboys with having variation names for Jax and Geras being George Floyd.

@monopool_ @angelheart2015 @KahnumEmpress You weren’t the only one who felt like having his ass in the game was a bad idea. Especially with what happened later on in the summer with the protests. You can’t tell ppl how to not feel about something like this. Idc if it’s just a fictional character or a game.

@spidal4ever @angelheart2015 @KahnumEmpress I publicly called out all the outros/brutalities that are pretty much police brutality and asked that nrs remove them and a bunch of ppl got extremely mad at me for it, it was ridiculous.
@angelheart2015 This is the same writers that thought it was ok to give Erron a confederate skin
@hellopiupius And they didn't change the name of the skin until a few months ago 💀
@angelheart2015 @KahnumEmpress I never listened to his intros bc I genuinely do not give a single shit about him but now im worried they added something relating to today’s police brutality 🙄
@spidal4ever @KahnumEmpress I'm afraid to ask about Robocop 💀

I literally called the racist one with Erron and Nightwolf about the whole "Cowboys and Indians" bullshit when Nightwolf was revealed. Thank fuck that one wasn't in the game but the fact that somebody wrote that and the others down and tried to approve them is so fucking gross. https://t.co/6VtR1MZeJ2

@hellopiupius I expected way less but damn! I'm just surprised they left the lines out but left that racist ass tower description for Erron when Tarkatans are compared to an actual Native tribe in terms of how violent they are. It's GROSS.
@angelheart2015 All the Nightwolf lines here are just...bad. It’s why their needs to be more poc in the writing room.
@greenlikeivy And if there's no writers, at least get a PR team of color to look over this shit and say what's racist and what's not.
@angelheart2015 Same, that was my biggest fear, but else would we expect from these writers? 😒😒
@angelheart2015 I can't even be mad these are all very in character dismissive ⬜ folk responses, especially for someone like Sonya who has a military boner.
@princesseheart You right lmao. I kinda saw Sonya's response from six miles away but didn't actually think the devs would put it in the game.
@angelheart2015 Considering what Jade says towards Jacqui and many others in the game, I’m not even surprised anymore. Don’t even get me started again on Robocop😒
